root.str: Radars cause enemy vehicles to automatically appear on the minimap.
The Burster XS uses smaller projectiles than the NS-10, allowing for a greater capacity and rate of fire.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Sunderer to 18 minutes.
Improves the top speed and acceleration of the Chimera.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 200 meters.
Earn revive experience with a Halloween mask equipped.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 570 rounds.

State-of-the-art air conditioning in Nanite Systems' perpetually burning skull helmet keeps it both looking and feeling cool.
+15% xp when worn
This item is only usable during Nanite of the Living Dead events.
Earn an Auraxium Medal on 3 different weapons.
Increases how long the weapon can be used before overheating.
Apply the Clover camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Adds a touch of convenience to your rolling war machine. All factions can use this gear.
Could not join squad because the invite has expired.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Magrider to 9 minutes.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 76 rounds.
Retrieve Knightly's gift from under the tree
Aim down your weapon's sights for improved accuracy. Hit their head for more damage.
Adds 38 rounds to the default magazine size.
Messages have been transferred to this vehicle. Your previous vehicle can no longer be used to complete the mission.
Use a sidearm to kill enemy players.
The Infiltrator is a recon unit with a short duration cloaking ability, spotting tools and the ability to hack enemy terminals and devices converting them to your empire.
Participate in defending a friendly facility.
Increases the amount of nanites gained by 50%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.48 seconds.
Replaces the MAX's capacitor with the upgraded JS236 model which recharges at an increased rate.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> With your assistance, we believe we've successfully developed plating capable of withstanding the energies on Esamir, at least in small quantities.
You have invited '[*player*]' to your outfit.

Cloak does not drain while stationary, but prevents use of primary weapons while equipped. While moving, cloak lasts up to 13 seconds. When drained, recharges to full in 13 seconds while cloaked and stationary, or in 10 seconds while uncloaked.
Bringing a knife to a gun fight just got a whole lot cooler.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Readings indicate that the data storage unit against the north wall is the point of origin. Retrieve the information if able. Perhaps the value will be worth the effort of retrieving it.
While out of combat, the Engineer will repair its ESF or Heavy Fighter over time for the equivalent of rank 1 Nanite Auto-Repair.
The launcher family includes both dumbfire and guided munitions.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> That'll do for now. The suit needs more work, but is a marked improvement over the alternative.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Chrome Razor Fins. NC use only.
Improved traction, turning, brakes and reverse speed.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Chrome Viper Fins. VS use only.
Apply the Esamir Ice camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
This bundle contains three random implants with a chance for an Exceptional implant.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 50 rounds.
<font color="#FF40FFCF">The harmful energy intensifies the closer you get.</font>
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Lightning. NC use only.
Unable to capture this base. Your empire does not own a connected region.
Large wall that once fully constructed can withstand a moderate amount of damage.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 40 rockets.

We need leaders who can field an elite squad of soldiers. As a squad leader with at least 5 additional soldiers under your command, we want you to work as a unit to wreak havoc on the battlefield.2889294226 ucdn
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest camo pattern to your weapon.
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. TR use only.
Thrust pads allow you to move quickly around the facility. Colored thrust pads can only be used by the empire that controls the facility.
No one showed up for the convoy. We'll try again soon.
Cannot access. Need Combat Medic class.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Heavy Assault. TR use only.
Applies a camo to your armor, weapon or vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
You do not have line-of-sight to the deploy location.
Aircraft: Use a liberator to shoot down 5 liberators
This bundle includes an assortment of Havoc TR Helmets at one great discount!
Adds 9 rounds to the default magazine size.
Port superstructure component has been damaged
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 shells.
Unlock enhancements for the Heavy Assault's suit slot. Suit Certifications can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 128 rockets.

We're regularly receiving requests for support from our forces engaging the enemy in battle zones across Auraxis. We're deploying soldiers with flexible skillsets to assist with the ever evolving battle conditions.
The Tech Plant benefit allows members of the controlling empire to spawn main battle tanks outside of their warpgate.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> If you are willing, Ayla has a prototype Insulated Suit waiting for you. If we can successfully withstand the storm's effects, the concepts could surely be expanded beyond it.
Social: Get 100 kills in a Liberator with a friend as the pilot
Increases the number of restoration kits that can be carried to 4.
Kill 3 enemies while flying a Reaver, Scythe, or Mosquito.
艾美瑞什: Capture and Hold 01
Creates a long lasting smoke screen around the Harsser that disrupts visibility and lock-ons for 10 seconds.
Improved vertical thrust, pitch, and agility. (More effective than previous rank)
An under barrel grenade launcher weapon attachment.
Apply the Zebra camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Renders nearby structures nearly indestructible by quickly repairing large amounts of health. Requires a nearby Silo to power the module. NC use only.

A Frag Grenade coated in a kinetic adhesive, allowing it to stick to almost any surface upon impact.

3 second fuse.
Currently, none of your friends are online.
Earn infantry kill assists while wielding any Heavy Weapon.
You get awesome benefits, and we get to keep making cool stuff. Everyone wins!
Unlock optic attachments to alter your weapon with
Honor this game's past with a lore-driven directive line.
Generates a decaying shield of nanites around the soldier that mitigates 35% damage instead of preventing it. Damage taken does not cause this shield to drain more quickly. Lasts up to 15 seconds.

The third iteration of the Terran Republic's Assault/Survival Knife features a razor edge capable of cutting through body armor. The RASK is preferred amongst many soldiers looking for a quiet, clean alternative to the standard-issue Chainblade.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 42 rounds.
Adds lightning trails to the Chimera's wheels. NSO only.
Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 75%.
Apply the Blue Chrome camo pattern to your vehicle.
Applies a loyalty decal to your armor, celebrating five years of PlanetSide 2.
The Scythe is the Vanu Sovereignty's one-man fighter. Vanu technology allows it to be a more stable aircraft when hovering and decelerating.
Dart could not be targeted. Out of range or missing AI module.
Occupants exiting the vehicle will no longer take fall damage or inherit their vehicle's momentum.
Auto-Adjusts your FOV to fit wider window resolutions (eg. Multi-Monitor Displays).
Interact with the vehicle terminal marked by your waypoint.
You automatically repair 30 health every second. Damage disables repairs for 10 seconds.
Make your presence known with this horn from Nanite Systems. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Forest v2 camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 6.25%
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Hoooo boy. You ready? Foster fronted for a Colossus Heavy Tank, just for you.
Causes an energy spike that harms all nearby infantry and vehicle targets while while dispersing a large amount of Tempest built up on the vehicle.

Nascent Expeditions, Auraxis' premier chartering and procurement specialists, are spearheading the logistical efforts to open the way back to Oshur. While Representative Nalla champions the effort, Coordinator Tolland will be your point of contact throughout the endeavor.
Travel to Auraxis using the Warpgate Terminal
Apply the Heavy Metal camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Increases the range of the EMP Spiker
Increases the strength of the air brakes on the Scythe by 15%.
Applies a cosmetic attachment to your vehicle. Usable by all factions.
Allows use of the long range 10x APS sniper scope.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Sword Hood Ornament. TR use only.
Increases the rotation speed of the Lightning by 20 degrees/second.
Allows use of the long range 10x IO-10 sniper scope.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. TR use only.
Cannot deploy while inside a warpgate region.
Help your Outfit gather resources and qualify for the war.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 5.83% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 8 seconds.
Need someone to man this gun!
Damage from impacts striking the rear of the vehicle is reduced.
Apply the Gear camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
Speak to Facilitator Emerson on the Observation Deck on Sanctuary.
Apply the single use Urban Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.375 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 174 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
On-board processors increase melee damage and finesse
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Tiger Fins. NC use only.
Contains several decals that can be applied to your armor, vehicle, or outfit. TR use only.
Burns fuel to increase the speed. Fuel lasts up to 1 second. A fully spent fuel tank will regenerate automatically in 15 seconds.
Reduces damage taken from frag grenades and common explosions by 50%; and infantry rockets and light anti-vehicle explosives by 20%.
See that your entire squad enjoys some travelling music as you deliver them to their untimely deaths.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 54 rounds.
[*player*] of the [*faction*] outfit [*outfit*] has brought their bastion planetside!
While cloaked the infiltrator will move faster but will take more damage
The Flash Flamethrower description goes here.
Apply the Intertwined camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
The Charged Plasma Cannon AP is the proprietary based weapon used by the Vanu Sovereignty against heavily armored targets
Celebrate PlanetSide 2's third anniversary with this mega bundle. Contains equivalent weapons for all 3 Empires! Note: the Heroic Boost is only provided to one character.
Adds 9 rounds to the default magazine size.

Though not officially sanctioned for use on the field, the TR has turned a blind eye to the use of the TRAC-Shot. Bolted together by TR mechanics in their downtime, the TRAC-Shot's multiple rail attachments are unconventional but effective.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Well done, soldier. Your efforts will be rewarded.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Scythe by 540 seconds.
This loadout is only used in the VR Room.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 shells.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding the Snake Eyes Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
A spawn control unit has been damaged.
Liberator composite armor reduces damage taken from flak, light tank rounds, heavy tank rounds and the Daltons blast damage.
Kill bounty targets with a rocket launcher.
Obtain cipher from 艾美瑞什, Hossin, or Indar.
Apply the Forest Greyscale camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Reduces the purchase timer of the vehicle by 25%
A 10x magnitude zoom precision sniper scope.
Toggle Nano-Regen Device. Use to heal yourself and nearby teammates. This consumes energy while active and will recharge when not in use.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> We cared less about developing weapons of war and more about taking care of our people and the world around us. Or maybe I just long for better days before people pretended to be a robots.
Increases the speed of health regeneration
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 3 minutes; also increases the radius in which the pack will resupply ammo to 4 meters.
Reduces damage taken from small arms, heavy machine guns, and gatling guns by 20%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 560 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that there is a signal that can be received in the vacinity of the Shattered Warpgate. Your assistance is requested in acquiring its origin.
This customization adds a Light Green decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.

Replaces 20% of the Vanguard's health with a fast regenerating shield layer. This shield has a 6 second recharge delay upon receiving damage, and a 12 second delay when broken. Regenerates 100 shield health per second.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> You will need to manually activate the Scanner in order to update its gauge. And the closer you get to your target, the more that gauge will be filled.

It's time to get back into the fight, soldier! We've loaded this bundle with faction specific equipment, and banners and camo usable by all factions. This bundle contains VS, NC, and TR item equivalents. Boosts are only available on the character who purchases the bundle.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> We think we're onto something after inspecting the energy in the vehicles you brought back. We want to compare this with readings from amp stations across each continent.
Warp terminals have a globe icon and are marked on your mini-map and heads-up-display.

Find fortune at the end of every trigger pull with this St. Patrick's Day themed NS Baron shotgun. This semi-auto powerhouse can put down targets at ranges beyond that of typical shotguns thanks to its narrow choke.
Press the spot key while you have an enemy in your crosshair to mark them for yourself and for nearby friendly players.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1200 rounds.
VS: Profile BG: VS Logo Name Placeholder
Increases total Anti Vehicle Grenade capacity
Customize your Vanguard with armor plating. NC use only.
The straight-pull bolt allows the sniper to chamber another round while aiming down sights.

To <font color="#7ff4ff">construct again</font>, select a new component item and <font color="#7ff4ff">repeat the process</font>. With the Implant Nano-Cycler from Nanite Systems, the possibilities are almost limitless!

10% off marketplace purchases
Free monthly 500 Battle Cash claim
+50% XP Gain
+400% Passive Cert Point Gain
+50% Nanite Gain
Monthly Double XP Weekend
Log-in queue priority
Access to Members-only Daily Sale
Exclusive promotions and offers
You have declined the invitation to join [*guild*].
Increases the power of the Nanite Proximity Repair System by 500%.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> AHHHH! Ahem. That's a long fall. While you're here you should look around. Someone built this place hidden for a reason.

For marksmen that prefer to not put themselves directly in the fray, the Nanite Systems Quadra scope allows users distance between themselves and their intended targets. The Quadra comes equipped with a simple crosshair at 4x magnification.
Adds Tire Spikes to the Sunderer. All factions can use this gear
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.75 second.
Revenge is sweet, but why stop there? NC use only.
Wearable by Engineer. VS use only.
Dismantle enemy constructs near Staging Sites
Equip the ME-42 Detection Device in the tactical slot (optional)
Input devices are disabled or not present.

The SpacePumpkins have invaded, and can be found sown throughout the battlefield. Smash these pumpkins for Halloween-themed cosmetics and other rewards, and work toward a new Halloween Directive line complete with new rewards! In addition, we've added new empire Assault Rifles, a balance changes, quality of life improvements, and whole host of new Player Studio items.
Adds orange chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer. NC use only.
The VX6-7's fast rate of fire and lightweight construction make it an excellent weapon in close quarters combat. VS use only.
Wearable by Infiltrator. VS use only.
The Illuminated Apex Helmet is based on ancient but effective designs that originated on Earth hundreds of years ago. TR use only.
Adds blue chassis lights to the under carriage of the Prowler.
Loyalty Until Death, Strength in Unity!
This customization adds a Smiley Face decal to the cockpit glass. All factions can use this gear.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Apply the single use Indar Scrub camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Adds chassis lights to the under carriage of the Sunderer. NSO use only.
Customize your Flash and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
Applies a banner to your character. VS use only.
Your raid leadership petition failed to process.

Previous data collection regarding future warpgate-destroying events was inconclusive. The Terran Republic has requested combat trained pilots for the deployment of additional Storm Buoys across the war-torn continents and the destruction of enemy aircaft that threaten the research.
Reduce the acquire timer of the Lightning and Prowler for 2 hours. Rank 25 required.
Shows the name of various HUD indicators when centering the mouse over them. By default, this option is set to true.
Increases the amount of rockets carried
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 10%
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Show some affection with these Cupid Horns, available for every vehicle. All factions can use this gear. ANT Cupid Horn unavailable on PS4.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> Do try to keep up.
NC - Pistol - Mid - V7 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 rounds.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Sentinel Voice Pack. VS Female use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> Alright, I've worked some magic to load our prize into the next harasser pulled from the nearby vehicle terminal that I went ahead and marked for you.
Apply the Thorn camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Make your presence known with this Sonic Wave horn from Nanite Systems. All factions can use this gear.
Adds 19 rounds to the default magazine size.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Lightning. NC use only.
Increases the vertical thrust speed of the Galaxy by 9KPH.
The NE-11 PML is available near Coordinator Tolland on the Atrium in Sanctuary.
Apply the single use African Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your Vanguard with Warrior Plating. NC use only.

Nearly all of the pieces for the construction of the Containment Sites have been collected, and Foster has asked you for a final favor. Using an air vehicle equipped with special sensor equipment, Foster requests readings from the conflux of energy pouring into the sky above The Shattered Warpgate itself.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Scythe by 480 seconds.
You automatically repair 35 health every second. Damage disables repairs for 10 seconds.
V26 Maelstrom Turbo Laser: Copper Medal

While the synthetic skin has some minor wear and tear on it, this high-tech titanium brain chassis (for the laymen out there: a skull) has a bit more character than new-in-box model.Provides a +10% xp bonus when worn during the annual Halloween Event.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership due to bad group.
The Standard Spawns list on your map shows the locations available for you to spawn on a continent.
Adds 7 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 19 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 rounds.
Customize your Flash with this cyan blinking antenna ball. VS use only.

Originally proposed as an alternative to the standard-issue AR-100, veteran marksmen found the automatic rate of fire and controllable recoil capable of downing distant targets with ease. NSO use only.
Primary: Assault Rifle: NC1 Gauss Rifle
Receiving damage from a standard explosive or light anti-vehicle weapon will trigger a shield that reduces damage from both resistance types by 50% for 6 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> One of the artifacts you delivered to our research team is transmitting coordinates off planet. Unfortunately, to determine the exact location, we need to recover a subspace cipher.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Replaces the default bolt with a low damage variant that includes a sensor device. The sensor can detect enemy movement within a limited range.
The TR released the Unity to commemorate the time-tested Cycler assault rifle, a key weapon attributed to helping bring Earth together under the Terran Republic's harmonious rule.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 140 rounds.
Improved cruising and afterburner speed. (More effective than previous rank)
Increases Merit & XP gains by 50% for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> That's adorable, but I simply don't have time for someone to play matchmaker.
An energy source capable of powering large machines and cities.
Apply the single use Arid Forest camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Hold Space Bar to Hide Screen

Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm will restock 30% of your primary and secondary weapon magazines for free. Additionally, dying will fully restock your primary and secondary weapon magazines from reserves.
Wearable by all classes. VS use only.
C-4 Explosives are capable of incredible damage to infantry and vehicles alike.

Genudine's heavily modified Guardian rifle was initially designed for long-range support for Heavy Assault soldiers ambushing from on high or in cover. Deadly from even long distances, the accurate Guardian can drop targets from afar with ammo to spare.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.5 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 116 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Apply the single use Forest Greyscale camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Burn fuel to increase the Magrider's top speed for up to 1 second. Fuel recharges from zero to full in 20 seconds.
Additional Gold plating to complement the look of your soldier. VS use only.
Use an Amp Station console on Esamir
Each squad member has a number corresponding to that member's position in the squad.
Detects the movement of hostile soldiers within 40 meters of the vehicle and reveals them on the mini-map for all vehicle occupants.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 36 rounds.
Customize your Sunderer and tear up the roads of Auraxis with these tire spikes. All factions can use this gear.
Contains a Solstice SF plus 1000 Certs

The weapon's muzzle flash and noise generation is reduced, and the player no longer appears on the minimap when firing. In exchange, the weapon's damage falls off 20 meters sooner, and bullet velocity is reduced by 15%.
NC's Heavy A. Baron GOLD Description
<font color="#7FF4FF">/region</font> - Sends a text message to all allied players in your region.
A standardized infrared scope that allows high visibility in low light situations.
The New Conglomerate has defended Peris!
Squads and Platoons - PlanetSide 2 Basic Training
Use the Lift to Reach the Top of the Tower
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
The incredibly popular PMG-100 became standard-issue after operatives lauded its high rate of fire, and the versatility afforded by its large magazine. NSO use only.
Awarded for mastery of the Liberator, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim is proof of its owner's ability in a gunship.
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 11.25%

Increases healing and revive speed by 10%. Revives MAX units at 7% health.

Hold Fire to heal and Aim to revive.
<font color="#00FFAA">Umatherin:</font> These heat signatures are most likely the product of brush fires or a still-operational solar battery, but we do not abide guesswork.

We need some data, from a source not on Esamir, to continue working on this theory. Foster will know where to get it. Also, it looks like representatives from your empire are starting to get involved. Speak with them.
This encrypted data drive contains vital intelligence that command needs to further the war effort.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1000 rounds.
You are not currently in a squad.
The NC-Nose Cannon 04 description goes here. Blah blah blah blah [TBD]
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4.29% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly:</font> We still have the original maps of the area, but they don't tell the whole story. Many soldiers died during the evacuation of Oshur, back before the rebirthing matrix was working.

We need to ensure a steady flow of Cortium to keep our bases powered and operational. Please gather and deposit Cortium using an Advanced Nanite Transport vehicle.

Participating in this mission will temporarily flag you as a High Value agent of Nanite Systems.
NC: Profile BG: NC Logo Name Placeholder
This customization adds a Jet Black decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
We welcome you to the Embassy of the Vanu Sovereignty. Praetor Umatherin has been looking forward to your arrival and will give you more information about your new role.
Heyyyyy, not bad. Passing that data on now. Hope it's worth the trouble. Why don't you cut loose on some of the red and purple so we don't look too subtle.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that you are now in the designated scan area. Please activate the scanner through the waypoint menu and remain in the area for its duration.
Get it? Gives bonus Space Pumpkin Seeds and increases experience gained by 50% for 3 days. Can only be used on this character.
Celebrate the Fifth Anniversary of PlanetSide 2 with this decal. This decal can be applied to vehicles.
Bends light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Cloak lasts for up to 12 seconds, and regenerates to full in 11 seconds.
Deposit Cortium into an allied silo.
The M20 Basilisk is a slow-firing 20mm HMG that effectively damages all targets, especially at close range. All factions can use this weapon.
Adds the Baron style hubcaps to your Harasser. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 shells.
Destroy generators at enemy containment facilities

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Our scientists are still poring over the transmitted data. We're attempting to reconstruct what was lost, and are scouring our databanks for similar patterns of recorded instability.
The Galaxy is an air transport that can be used to hot drop up to 11 soldiers. It has four weapon mounts that can be used for defense or outfitted into a gunship role.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Designates the wearer as an honorary member of the Nascent Expedition team.
Allows cortium to be used to create a module that, when powered, renders nearby structures nearly indestructible thanks to lightning-fast repairs. VS use only.
TR - Sniper Rifle - Mid - V8 Description(Delete Me -BB)
The Illuminated Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. VS use only.
Adds 13 rounds to the default magazine size.
Mounted on the left wing engine of the Galaxy, this secondary weapon covers the area the left. Operated by the passenger in seat 4.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. NC use only.
Adds 15 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the Tiger Stripe camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> WOO-WOO! Yeah! Who's pumped to find where to use that keycard? *cough* I have been informed that it should be somewhere within the facility.
Adds white chassis lights to the under carriage of the Lightning.
Adds this customization to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.

Allows the Prowler to deploy which increases the reload speed of the primary weapon by 12% and projectile speed by 30% but the Prowler is unable to move. The Prowler must not be moving to engage deployment.
Constructs a large, fortified wall with firing areas for infantry.
I have a visual on an enemy Liberator.
While in the Warpgate, you can instantly deploy to your squad's location by pressing the INSERT key by default.
You successfully sped up outfit asset crafting.
Creates a laser grid overhead that will severely injure enemy infantry that pass through it. VS only.
Increases fuel capacity and regeneration speed by 8%.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 2 rounds, and the weapon takes 15% longer to equip and unequip.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 600 rounds.

The TRs' Bighorn .50M surpassed the RAMS as the heaviest sniper rifle in their arsenal. Boasting an unmatched bullet velocity and a straight-pull bolt for rapid shots, the deafening crack of the Bighorn is a warning to distant soldiers.

Deconstruction Tool is used to quickly despawn construction objects you or any of your squad members have placed; it can also be used to despawn any construction object within the sphere of influence of a HIVE you or your squad members own.
